name: Vadim Jelezniakov
biography: Vadim Jelezniakov is a Lead Software Engineer and Infrastructure Evangelist at The New York Times. At the Times, he leads the creation of processes and tools that allow NYTimes.com to grow and manage its computing infrastructure in a controlled and sane way. He is also the master mind behind NYTimes.com’s own Cloud Manager and a contributor to several open source projects including CloudMaster and MRToolkit. When his head is not in the clouds, he teaches Aikido and plays Wii with his daughter.
